modName: The Dovahkiins New Allies by Netherwalk
summary: Follower mod which will be updated with variants and new followers on a regular basis. I created these for myself but am sharing like I did with my other mods.
descriptionHtml:
$$$$$$$$ NEWS $$$$$$$$
CHECK THIS AMAZING MOD OUT! 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23755]Inhabitants of Skyrim Npc Overhaul by Rops1981[/url]
It will transform the faces of your Skyrim for the better!

Part 2 version 1.0 release.
Adds 14 new followers spread through out Whiterun. Search everywhere to find them all.
Kelsa, Thenia and Sebjorn all feature tattoos and warpaints by TairenSoul.

Version 1.1 update
all characters were tweaked and given better facegens.
Preen, Nemizra and Sharizel all got cool new warpaint thanks to TairenSoul.
some of the characters now wear armor from omega reds compilation. 

Required files.
This follower mod will not work without 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
ApachiiSkyhairMale. use the same link as the apachii above. 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10277]Omegared99 Armor Compilation[/url]
Cazy Hairs (for mens) This file is included in my mod. Thanks to zzjay for their permission.

Part 2 requirements.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
ApachiiSkyhairMale. use the same link as the apachii above. 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10277]Omegared99 Armor Compilation[/url]

Recommended mods but not required.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27815]Fine Face Textures by urshi[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26145]Smooth male Body Normal Maps[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25211]Female Face Tattoo by TairenSoul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25791]Male Face Tattoo by TairenSoul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933]Exstensible Follower Framework[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]Eyes Of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18820]Inhabitants of Skyrim[/url]
For the best looking presets and save games around!
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19623]Cazy Hairs[/url]

Other mods by me.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22616]The Hirelings[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22524]The Companions by Netherwalk[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21540]Vilkas and Farkas[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21749]Vizerin by Netherwalk[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22155]Housecarls by Netherwalk[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27247]Friends of the Dovahkiin[/url]

Want your Skyrim to look like mine? try out these amazing ENBs I personally use. You can see them at work in my galleries and screenshots.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23812]Seasons of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20741]Synergy/Dark[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21350]Winterheart 2[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21123]The Wilds[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24828]Bleak/Unbleak[/url]
author: netherwalk
